Text.Page:
It's dangerous down there. Kill {@LinkCreature:8#3011#gula mutilators}, {@LinkCreature:8#3022#slavering auric imps}, {@LinkCreature:8#3031#gula ravagers}, {@LinkCreature:8#3041#gula overseers}, {@LinkCreature:8#3042#kobold thugs}, and {@LinkCreature:8#3051#kobold hirelings}.

Report to Loxetrius in the Catacombs when the mission is complete.
Excellent. The fewer of them, the better!
Unfinished work does not put a smile on this face. Have you noticed that?
